template.name: RxViper Module
template.description: Creates new RxViper classes - ViewCallbacks, Interactor, Presenter and Router

parameter.name: Module Name
parameter.help: The name of the module that requires Viper

parameter.name: Generate Interactor
parameter.help: If true, an Interactor file will be generated

parameter.name: Generate Router
parameter.help: If true, a Router will be generated

parameter.name: Use @Inject annotation
parameter.help: If true, an @Inject annotation will be used

parameter.name: Support Kotlin
parameter.help: If true, Kotlin files will be created instead of Java

parameter.name: Enable lambda-expressions
parameter.help: If true, lambda-expressions will be used instead of anonymous classes
